across.clue: At night, you see this round disc shining. (4)
An underground tunnel that an animal lives in. (6)
You can find these small objects along the seashore. (6)
This animal is sometimes called the king of the jungle. (4)
You hear this sound when you see lightning. (7)
This plant doesn't need much water and can grow in the desert. (6)
Fish, frogs and jellyfish all do this. (4)
A tiny acorn can grow into this. (4)
This animal has long ears and hops fast! (6)
Baby birds hatch out of these. (4)

down.clue: Kangaroos carry their babies around in this. (5)
This fruit is named after its colour. (6)
This sea creature can grow bigger than several elephants! (5)
They're fluffy and can be seen floating in the sky. (6)
The home that a bird builds. (4)
This slithery creature doesn't have feet. (5)
This ribbon of colours appears in the sky after a rainstorm. (7)
Lots of people like to wish on one of these. (4)
It winds along, carrying water to the ocean. (5)
You plant and water it to grow a flower. (4)
